channel.title: CVE Feed for gVectors Team -- wpForo Forum (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-40632|2024-09-16T18:59:25.453Z -- gvectors%20team -- wpforo%20forum%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in gVectors Team wpForo Forum plugin <= 2.0.5 on WordPress leading to topic deletion.

item.title: CVE-2022-40200|2024-09-16T19:04:53.164Z -- gvectors%20team -- wpforo%20forum%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
